quiz.text: What is the target year to eliminate Kala-Azar from India?
options: 2025
2027
2024
2023
2030

quiz.text: In India, Kala-azar is endemic in 633 blocks of 54 districts in four states. Which of the following is not one of the four states in which Kala-Azar is endemic?
options: Bihar
Madhya Pradesh
Uttar Pradesh
West Bengal
Jharkhand

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), which of the following organizations has/ have launched the Scope for Mainstreaming Ayurveda Research in Teaching Professionals (SMART) program?
options: National Commission for Indian System of Medicine
Central Council for Research in Ayurvedic Sciences
WHO
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), the 1st All India Annual States' Ministers Conference has been organized by the Ministry of Jal Shakti in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh. The Conference had 5 thematic sessions. Which of the following is not one of the thematic sessions?
options: Water Security in Water Deficit, Water Surplus and Hilly Regions
Water Use Efficiency including Reuse of Waste Water/ Grey Water
Water Quality
Water Governance
Water Harvesting

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to National Skill Development Mission?

A.     It has a target to train a maximum of 300 million skilled people by 2022.

B.      It has seven sub-missions.

C.      It has a four tier system to achieve the mission objective.
options: A and B
B only
A and C
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text: As per the recently (Jan 2023) released 1st Advance Estimates of National Income, 2022-23, the growth in real GDP during 2022-23 is estimated at what percentage?
options: 6.7%
7.2%
7.0%
6.9%
6.5%

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), the Ministry of Finance shared about the GST (Goods and Services Tax) collection of December 2022. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to GST?
options: GST is applicable on supply of good and services both.
It is a source-based taxation.
It has 4 major tax rate slabs.
IGST is levied on all interstate supplies across two or more states/Uts.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), the Union Minister for Youth Affairs and Sports has launched the themes of Y20 summit, logo and website in the Curtain raiser event of Y20 Summit India in New Delhi. There will be Pre summits on  ________ Y20 (Youth 20) themes along with various discussions at different Universities across states in India.
options: three
five
seven
four
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), the Ministry of Coal has informed that it will be taking up additional 19 First Mile Connectivity (FMC) projects. Which of the following is the objective of the FMC?
options: To reduce the time for transportation of coal from mines to power plants.
To replace the existing road transport in coalmines by drones.
To encourage power plants to setup near the coal fields.
To replace the existing road transport in coalmines by mechanized systems.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), the Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) has launched various initiatives at its 76th Foundation Day. BIS launched ‘Standards Clubs in Schools’ aims to expose science students of __________ to the concepts of Quality and Standardization through student centric activities.
options: class 9th and above
class 11th and 12th
class 6th to 10th
class 6th and above
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), the Unique Identification Authority of India (UIDAI) has enabled a facility by which address in Aadhaar can be updated online with the consent of the Head of Family (HoF). Any resident above the age of _______ can be an HOF for this purpose.
options: 25
30
18
35
21

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), the Government of Himachal Pradesh has launched the Chief Minister Sukhashray Sahayata Kosh to help which of the following categories of people to get higher education?
options: Destitute women
Needy students
Girl students
1 and 2
1 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), the India Meteorological Department (IMD) has declared 2022 as the fifth warmest year for India since 1901. The highest warming was observed in India in _______ when the average temperature was 0.71 degrees Celsius above the long-term average.
options: 2008
2012
2018
2016
2021

quiz.text:
Recently (Jan 2023), the Convergence Energy Services Limited (CESL) has floated a tender for 4,675 electric buses worth ₹5,000 crore on the basis of a dry lease under National Electric Bus Programme (NEBP).

Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to NEBP & CESL?
options: CESL was mandated by NITI Aayog to implement National Electric Bus Programme.
Aim of NEBP is deployment of 50,000 electric Buses across country.
CESL is a subsidiary of state-owned Energy Efficiency Services Limited (EESL).
2 and 3
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), the Chief Justice of India (CJI) has announced the launch of e-SCR project. Which of the following is the full form of e-SCR project?
options: Electronic Supreme Court Reports
Electronic Supreme Court Rulings
Electronic Supreme Court Response
Electronic Supreme Court Reply
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has released India’s International Investment Position (IIP) for September 2022. What is the ratio of international assets to international liabilities in September 2022?
options: 24.8%
45.1%
68.5%
76.4%
81.7%

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), Dr. Vinaya Prakash Singh has took over as the Secretary General of the Asian Pacific Postal Union (APPU) for a tenure of 4 years. APPU is headquartered in which of the following locations?
options: Bangkok, Thailand
Delhi, India
Dhaka, Bangladesh
Beijing, China
Jakarta, Indonesia

quiz.text:
Which of the following countries is/are the first-time member of UNSC?

A.     Mozambique

B.      Switzerland

C.      Georgia
options: A and B
B only
A and C
A only
A, B and C

quiz.text: What is the duration of non-Permanent members of UNSC at the UNSC?
options: 1 year
4 years
2 years
5 years
6 years

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), the NSWS Portal has achieved a new milestone by crossing 75 thousand approvals for various Central and State/UTs. Major portion (57,850) of Approvals is cleared by which of the following ministries?
options: Ministry of Finance
Ministry of Home Affairs
Ministry of Commerce and Industry
Ministry of Defence
Ministry of Corporate Affairs
